command.name: ping

option.name: --ttl
option.description: initial TTL of the ICMP echo-request message

command.abstract: test the reachability of another node

description.p: This command tests the reachability of another node by sending a probe message (like an ICMP echo-request) and waiting for an answer (ICMP echo-reply). The command will only succeed if the destination node is also able to reach the source node.
